title: 조석현
content:
한양대학교 서울캠퍼스
의과대학
의학과
이비인후과학교실
교수이다.
학력
1994 한양대학교 의과대학 의학사
2001 한양대학교 비인후과 의학석사
2003 고려대학교 비인후과 의학박사
2009-2011 미국 Johns Hopkins University Post-doc research fellow
연구실적
Rethinking AASM guideline for split-night polysomnography in Asian patients with obstructive sleep apnea. Sleep Breath. 2015 Dec;19(4):1273-7.
Altered Quality of Life and Psychological Health (SCL-90-R) in Patients With Chronic Rhinosinusitis With Nasal Polyps. Ann Otol Rhinol Laryngol. 2015 Aug;124(8):663-70.
Decreased diversity of nasal microbiota and their secreted extracellular vesicles in patients with chronic rhinosinusitis based on a metagenomic analysis. Allergy. 2014 Apr;69(4):517-26.
Regulation of nasal airway homeostasis and inflammation in mice by SHP-1 and Th2/Th1 signaling pathways. PLoS One. 2014 Aug 4;9(8):e103685.
Sex-specific characteristics of anthropometry in patients with obstructive sleep apnea: neck circumference and waist-hip ratio. Ann Otol Rhinol Laryngol. 2014 Jul;123(7):517-23.
Spontaneous eosinophilic nasal inflammation in a genetically-mutant mouse: comparative study with an allergic inflammation model. PLoS One. 2012;7(4):e35114.
Cbl-b regulates airway mucosal tolerance to aeroallergen. Clin Exp Allergy. 2011 Mar;41(3):434-42.
